column4: in Feisty I had 192.168.11.160:/mnt/ide2/public /mnt/nas nfs rsize=8192,wsize=8192,timeo=14,intr 0 0 in my fstab but in Intrepid I get ount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock when trying to mount my nas - any ideas?
do you have nfs support installed ?
I don't think so - in Connect to Server it's not listed - I thought it was default tho - how do I install it?
is it just nfs-client I need to install?
